### handleCalleesMD() {#a4f04c6f908fc9d132e025f31d40fc976}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AMDGPUSplitModule.cpp&#125;::handleCalleesMD (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Callees)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Checks if <code>I</code> has MD&#95;callees and if it does, parse it and put the function in <code>Callees</code>.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if there was metadata and it was parsed correctly. false if there was no MD or if it contained unknown entries and parsing failed. If this returns false, <code>Callees</code> will contain incomplete information and must not be used.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-cpp/#l00488">488</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-cpp">AMDGPUSplitModule.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isNonCopyable() {#aab8baf5cac98f374fa37771b1491d59a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AMDGPUSplitModule.cpp&#125;::isNonCopyable (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Checks whether a given function is non-copyable.

Non-copyable functions cannot be cloned into multiple partitions, and only one copy of the function can be present across all partitions.

Kernel functions and external functions fall into this category. If we were to clone them, we would end up with multiple symbol definitions and a very unhappy linker.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-cpp/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-cpp">AMDGPUSplitModule.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
